short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switches to the next tab and refreshes it every 20 seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Refresh & Switch Tabs is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by automatically switching to the next tab and refreshing the subsequent tab at customizable intervals. 

Whether you're monitoring multiple webpages, refreshing dashboards, or managing tabs for other purposes, this extension offers convenience and flexibility with its easy-to-use interface.

Key Features:

Customizable Timing: Set the interval timing according to your preference. Enter your desired time in seconds, and the extension will automatically switch and refresh tabs based on your input.

Simple Toggle: Easily enable or disable the automatic tab switching and refreshing feature with a simple toggle switch. No need to go into the manage extensions page to turn it off.

Efficient Workflow: Automatically switches to the next tab and refreshes the subsequent tab, helping you stay up-to-date with live information across multiple tabs.

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive popup interface makes it easy to set your preferred timing and manage the extension's functionality.

Stay on top of your tabs and streamline your browsing experience with Auto Refresh & Switch Tabs .
